Centre of Mass.docstring:
Calculates the center of mass (x_cm) for a 1D system of discrete particles.

Parameters:
    masses (list[float]): A list of the masses of the particles in kilograms (kg).
    positions (list[float]): A list of the corresponding 1D positions (x) of the particles in meters (m).

Returns:
    float: The position of the center of mass in meters (m).

Calculates the distance of two point masses from their mutual center of mass, given the distance between them.

Parameters:
    mass_1 (float): The first mass (m1) in kilograms (kg).
    mass_2 (float): The second mass (m2) in kilograms (kg).
    total_distance (float): The total distance (L) separating the two masses in meters (m).

Returns:
    tuple[float, float]: A tuple containing (r1, r2), where r1 is the distance from m1 to the CoM and r2 is the distance from m2 to the CoM, both in meters (m).

Calculates the center of mass (x_c, y_c) of a uniform rectangular plate, relative to one corner (0,0).

Parameters:
    base (float): The length of the plate along the x-axis (b) in meters (m).
    height (float): The length of the plate along the y-axis (L) in meters (m).

Returns:
    tuple[float, float]: The (x, y) coordinates of the center of mass in meters (m).
Centre of Mass.python_code:
def calculate_com_rectangular_plate(base: float, height: float) -> tuple[float, float]:
    return (base / 2, height / 2)

Centre of Mass.docstring:
Calculates the y-coordinate of the center of mass for a uniform triangular plate, measured from its base.

Parameters:
    height (float): The height (h) of the triangle perpendicular to the base in meters (m).

Returns:
    float: The y-coordinate (y_c) of the center of mass from the base in meters (m).
Centre of Mass.python_code:
def calculate_com_triangular_plate(height: float) -> float:
    return height / 3

Centre of Mass.docstring:
Calculates the y-coordinate of the center of mass for a uniform semicircular ring, measured from the center of the diameter.

Parameters:
    radius (float): The radius (R) of the ring in meters (m).

Returns:
    float: The y-coordinate (y_c) of the center of mass in meters (m).

Calculates the y-coordinate of the center of mass for a uniform semicircular disc, measured from the center of the diameter.

Parameters:
    radius (float): The radius (R) of the disc in meters (m).

Returns:
    float: The y-coordinate (y_c) of the center of mass in meters (m).

Calculates the y-coordinate of the center of mass for a uniform hemispherical shell, measured from the center of its circular base.

Parameters:
    radius (float): The radius (R) of the shell in meters (m).

Returns:
    float: The y-coordinate (y_c) of the center of mass in meters (m).
Centre of Mass.python_code:
def calculate_com_hemispherical_shell(radius: float) -> float:
    return radius / 2

Centre of Mass.docstring:
Calculates the y-coordinate of the center of mass for a uniform solid hemisphere, measured from the center of its circular base.

Parameters:
    radius (float): The radius (R) of the hemisphere in meters (m).

Returns:
    float: The y-coordinate (y_c) of the center of mass in meters (m).
Centre of Mass.python_code:
def calculate_com_solid_hemisphere(radius: float) -> float:
    return (3 * radius) / 8

Centre of Mass.docstring:
Calculates the y-coordinate of the center of mass for a uniform solid circular cone, measured from the center of its base.

Parameters:
    height (float): The height (h) of the cone in meters (m).

Returns:
    float: The y-coordinate (y_c) of the center of mass in meters (m).
Centre of Mass.python_code:
def calculate_com_solid_cone(height: float) -> float:
    return height / 4

Centre of Mass.docstring:
Calculates the y-coordinate of the center of mass for a uniform hollow circular cone (surface only), measured from the center of its base.

Parameters:
    height (float): The height (h) of the cone in meters (m).

Returns:
    float: The y-coordinate (y_c) of the center of mass in meters (m).
Centre of Mass.python_code:
def calculate_com_hollow_cone(height: float) -> float:
    return height / 3

Centre of Mass.docstring:
Calculates the velocity of the center of mass (v_cm) for a 1D system of discrete particles.

Parameters:
    masses (list[float]): A list of the masses of the particles in kilograms (kg).
    velocities (list[float]): A list of the corresponding 1D velocities (v) of the particles in m/s.

Returns:
    float: The velocity of the center of mass in m/s.

Calculates the total linear momentum (P_system) of a system of particles.

Parameters:
    total_mass (float): The total mass (M) of the system in kilograms (kg).
    com_velocity (float): The velocity of the center of mass (v_cm) in m/s.

Returns:
    float: The total linear momentum of the system in kilogram-meters per second (kg·m/s).
Centre of Mass.python_code:
def calculate_system_momentum(total_mass: float, com_velocity: float) -> float:
    return total_mass * com_velocity

Centre of Mass.docstring:
Calculates the acceleration of the center of mass (a_cm) for a 1D system of discrete particles.

Parameters:
    masses (list[float]): A list of the masses of the particles in kilograms (kg).
    accelerations (list[float]): A list of the corresponding 1D accelerations (a) of the particles in m/s^2.

Returns:
    float: The acceleration of the center of mass in m/s^2.

Calculates the net external force (F_ext) on a system using Newton's second law for a system.

Parameters:
    total_mass (float): The total mass (M) of the system in kilograms (kg).
    com_acceleration (float): The acceleration of the center of mass (a_cm) in m/s^2.

Returns:
    float: The net external force on the system in Newtons (N).
Centre of Mass.python_code:
def calculate_net_external_force(total_mass: float, com_acceleration: float) -> float:
    return total_mass * com_acceleration

Centre of Mass.docstring:
Calculates the impulse (J) applied to an object based on its change in linear momentum (ΔP).

Parameters:
    final_momentum (float): The final momentum (P_f) in kg·m/s.
    initial_momentum (float): The initial momentum (P_i) in kg·m/s.

Returns:
    float: The impulse (J) in Newton-seconds (N·s).
Centre of Mass.python_code:
def calculate_impulse_from_momentum_change(final_momentum: float, initial_momentum: float) -> float:
    return final_momentum - initial_momentum

Centre of Mass.docstring:
Calculates the coefficient of restitution (e) for a 1D collision between two objects.

Parameters:
    initial_velocity_1 (float): Initial velocity of the first object (u1) in m/s.
    initial_velocity_2 (float): Initial velocity of the second object (u2) in m/s.
    final_velocity_1 (float): Final velocity of the first object (v1) in m/s.
    final_velocity_2 (float): Final velocity of the second object (v2) in m/s.

Returns:
    float: The coefficient of restitution (e) (unitless).

Calculates the thrust force (Ft) generated by ejecting or adding mass at a constant relative velocity.

Parameters:
    relative_velocity (float): The relative velocity (v_rel) of the ejected/added mass w.r.t. the system in m/s.
    mass_flow_rate (float): The rate of change of mass (dm/dt) in kg/s.

Returns:
    float: The thrust force (Ft) in Newtons (N).
Centre of Mass.python_code:
def calculate_thrust_force(relative_velocity: float, mass_flow_rate: float) -> float:
    return relative_velocity * mass_flow_rate

Centre of Mass.docstring:
Calculates the final velocity (v) of a rocket (Tsiolkovsky rocket equation), ignoring gravity and starting from rest.

Parameters:
    exhaust_velocity (float): The relative exhaust velocity of the propellant (v_r) in m/s.
    initial_mass (float): The initial total mass of the rocket (m0) in kg.
    final_mass (float): The final mass of the rocket after propellant is expended (m) in kg.

Returns:
    float: The final velocity (v) of the rocket in m/s.
